query: 如图,点E,F是正方形ABCD内的两个点,AB=13,AE=CF=5,BE=DF=12,线段EF的长为()选项：['7', '7√{2}', '\\frac{19}{2}', '\\frac{15√{2}}{2}']
answer: 解:如图,延长AE交DF于G,∵AB=13,AE=5,BE=12,∴AE²+BE²=AB²,∴△ABE是直角三角形,∴同理可得,△DFC是直角三角形,∵四边形ABCD是正方形,∴∠BAD=∠ABC=∠BCD=∠ADC=90°,AB=BC=CD=AD,∴∠BAE+∠DAG=90°,在△ABE和△CDF中,\begin{cases}AB=CD\\AE=CF\\BE=DF\\\end{cases},∴△ABE≌△CDF(SSS),∴∠BAE=∠DCF,又∵∠DCF+∠CDF=∠ADF+∠CDF=90°,∴∠DCF=∠ADG,∴∠BAE=∠ADG,∵∠BAE+∠DAG=90°,∴∠ADG+∠DAG=90°,∴∠DGA=90°,即△AGD是直角三角形,在△AGD和△BAE中,\begin{cases}∠AGD=∠BEA\\∠ADG=∠BAE\\AD=BA\\\end{cases},∴△AGD≌△BAE(ASA),∴AG=BE=12,DG=AE=5,∴EG=12-5=7,同理可得:GF=7,∴Rt△EFG中,EF=√{7²+7²}=7√{2},故选:B．
